caption: Agent Object
description: The object holding the agent data or hash of the agent data together with metadata about the agent.
name: agent_object

cid.caption: CID
cid.description: Globally-unique content identifier of the object. Encodes fully-qualified type of the object as part of 'codec'. Specs: CID (Content IDentifier) Specification

object_type.caption: Schema Type
object_type.description: Schema type of the object. Can be used to identify the format of the data.

record.caption: Raw Agent Data
record.description: The encoded agent data in bytes.
